featured.text: In this movie, Leonardo DiCaprio played both King Louis XIV and his twin brother Philippe.

definition.zh_def: 菲利普，一個常見的男性名字，源自希臘語，意為「愛馬者」。
definition.en_def: Philippe is a common male given name of Greek origin meaning 'lover of horses'.
definition.example: Philippe is planning to visit Paris next summer.
